sentences.sContent: The book’s theme is the conflict between love and duty.
sentences.sCn: 本书的主题是爱与责任之间的冲突。
瓦格纳歌剧中的弗莱雅主旋律

sentences.sContent: ...The common theme of the UN reports is the relation between environmental protection and economic growth...
...but the theme of the essay should center around its impact on you...

remMethod.val: the ＋ me → 就是我 → 研究的主题就是我 → 主题

words.tran: 主题的，主旋律的；题目的；语干的

trans.tranCn: 题目；主题；主旋律；（句子的）主位；词干
trans.tranOther: the main subject or idea in a piece of writing, speech, film etc
